description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Tearing

Note: Space Marines Only. Relic Master-Crafted Astartes Heavy Bolter of the Deathwatch. User cannot be the Squad Leader. The Squad Leader suffers -10 to tests to prevent Cohesion Damage. The weapon is a symbol of honour, but also of disobeying orders.

system.notes: Space Marines Only. Relic Master-Crafted Astartes Heavy Bolter of the Deathwatch. User cannot be the Squad Leader. The Squad Leader suffers -10 to tests to prevent Cohesion Damage. The weapon is a symbol of honour, but also of disobeying orders.
